entry.name: Host-visit malicious sites plus
entry.caption: Host-visit malicious sites plus
entry.query: (category eq command-and-control) or (category eq hacking) or (category eq malware) or (category eq phishing)

entry.name: Hosts visit malicious sites
entry.caption: Hosts visit malicious sites
entry.query: (category eq command-and-control) or (category eq hacking) or (category eq malware) or (category eq phishing)

entry.name: Hosts visit questionable sites
entry.caption: Hosts visit questionable sites
entry.query: (category eq dynamic-dns) and (category eq parked) and (category eq questionable) and (category eq unknown)

entry.name: Host-visit quest sites plus
entry.caption: Host-visit quest sites plus
entry.query: (category eq dynamic-dns) and (category eq parked) and (category eq questionable) and (category eq unknown)
entry.description: Detail of hosts visiting questionable URLs

entry.name: Wildfire malicious verdicts
entry.caption: Wildfire malicious verdicts
entry.description: Files uploaded or downloaded that were later found to be malicious. This is a summary. Act on real-time email.

entry.name: Wildfire verdicts SMTP
entry.caption: Wildfire verdicts SMTP
entry.description: Links sent from emails found to be malicious.

security.rules:
{%- if INCLUDE_PAN_EDL == 'yes' %}
Block outbound sessions with destination address matching one of the Palo Alto Networks external dynamic lists for high risk and known malicious IP addresses.
any
any
any
panw-highrisk-ip-list panw-known-ip-list panw-bulletproof-ip-list
any
any
any
any
any
deny default
Outbound
Block inbound sessions with source address matching one of the Palo Alto Networks external dynamic lists for high risk and known malicious IP addresses.
any
any
panw-highrisk-ip-list panw-known-ip-list panw-bulletproof-ip-list
any
any
any
any
any
any
deny default
Inbound
{% endif %}
Block outbound sessions that match a malicious domain and have been redirected to a configured sinkhole IP address.
any
any
any
Sinkhole-IPv4 Sinkhole-IPv6
any
any
any
any
any
deny default
Outbound

entry.name: NO-Decrypt URL Categories
entry.description: This rule does not do Decryption. This rule is validating SSL Protocol Communications.

entry.name: NO-Decrypt Rule
entry.description: This rule does not do Decryption. This rule is validating SSL Protocol Communications.

entry.name: iron-skillet-version
entry.comments: version 0.0.3 for 9.0: version of this IronSkillet template file

entry.name: Exception-AV
entry.description: Use this profile for rules needing modifications to the standard
